message.content:
The most likely categories for the Ikea Rast 3 Drawers Chest Dresser would be:

1) Furniture & Décor: This is the most likely category as the product is a chest dresser, which falls under the furniture category.

2) Home & Kitchen: This category is also likely as the product is used for storage in a home setting.

3) Home Improvement: This category is possible as the product requires basic assembly, which can be considered a home improvement task.

4) Office Products: This category is less likely but still possible as the product can be used for storage in an office or workspace.

5) Tools & Home Improvement: This category is less likely but still possible as the product requires assembly and can be considered a tool for organizing and storing items.

Reasoning: The product description and dimensions indicate that the Ikea Rast 3 Drawers Chest Dresser is a piece of furniture used for storage. This aligns with the categories of Furniture & Décor, Home & Kitchen, and Home Improvement. The mention of basic assembly also suggests that it could be categorized under Office Products or Tools & Home Improvement.

prompt:
Title: Ikea Rast 3 Drawers Chest Dresser
Content: Product dimensions Width: 24 3/8 " Depth: 11 3/4 " Height: 27 1/2 " Product description Main parts: Solid pine Back/ Drawer bottom: Fiberboard Drawer sides/ Drawer back: Particleboard, Foil This item requires basic assembly...
